UK Governments tortures and harassments!
17 years me and 23 years my daughter, than my daughter boy age 7, girl age 18 month, been tortured and harassed by British governments! And all my family been terrorised by British gov on worldwide! This is anti humanity! This is black terrorism! We all need take British gov to USA, European court of justice to save me and my kids and grand children’s!
M Tahani
